entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C

Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
